div.bibl: Chicago Greek Daily, Nov. 16, 1929. GRAND DANCE OF AHEPA.

body.p: On Nov. 18 at 8:30 P.M., in the Grand Bellroom of the Trianon, through the initiative of the Chicago, Evanston, and Oak Park chapters of the organization, for the benefit of Greek schools conducted under the direct supervision and guerdian-ship of our organized communities.

The chapters above referred to are nine in number. One of the words that characterize the organization is education, which is one of its fundamental aims. In more than one way, according to the intellectual and material resources of its membership, it has proved its willingness to put into effect this aim of education.
